description:
Five minutes into creating a circuit would do nothing but freeze up the computer.
Had to reboot my computer multiple times.

Fritzing is simply my way-to-go for planning an electronics prototype and pcb design. I'm also a mechatronics engineering student. Drag and drop features, simple controls and lots of flexibility. Definitely recommend it!
I have tried many different PCB/circuit design programs and I could not make sense of any of them but I felt like I knew how to use Fritzing as soon as the program launched.
u can simulate ur breadboard here, nice ui, easy to use, lightweight
Unfortunately, it's broken - both in this repo and on the website. On Ubuntu 18.04: won't show the window or won't load the parts or won't recognize them
This is a great app, I've used it for years but since I upgraded the other day nothing is working. It won't load the parts or won't recognize them.
summary: won't load the parts or won't recognize them

description: Works really well, I used it to make a diagram of my pinewood derby timer electronics. But the package appears to be broken for me (Ubuntu 18.04), but downloading it directly from the website worked.
this really sucks because of the fact that this used to work, but now even THIS version of it doesnt. It just randomly crashes when you try to do something, like search for parts. What a shame...
Current version needs fix for parts, see instructions here https://forum.fritzing.org/t/fixing-fritzing-on-ubuntu-18-04/6504
As mentioned already in one of the reviews the app it's broken on Ubuntu 18.04. Nothing works.

Easy to use, intuitive and complete af any tools you need to develop your PCB ! Full component libary ready to use !!
Awesome!

I'm using fedora linux and I'm unable to drag and drop any of the components. This basically makes fritzing useless. I've tried reinstalling it several times but it doesn't seem to work. I've tried fritzing on Windows also. There the problem was that after using it two to three times it would give out a pop up message about the list of components that it could not load. And the worst part was that the list contained essentially all the components. I don't know if its a problem with my machine but would be obliged if you look into the problem.
Its the best app that i have found for circuiting with huge community support.
Has everything you need.
Now I Just Quit The Arduino Ide For The One In Fritzing
There are NO parts in this version

This application did not last long on my system.
(1) Increasing the size of a piece of stripboard to 38 strips by 61 holes (just a standard Eurocard size...) brought the rendering engine to its knees.
(2) Changing a resistor to a surface-mount 0805 for copper-side mounting didn't work. It remained as a fixed-length through-hole.
(3) I wanted something to help me think-out new designs by allowing me to draw the physical layout on a stripboard substrate, thus bypassing the god-awful breadboard stage. I had high hopes, but no results with Fritzing.

I have been using LT Spice with modified components (easily done) to do the physical modelling work, and as a bonus the performance and function can be tested as you create your design. You just tinker with the circuit (function) and layout (form; use the grid option) until happy, and then build in the knowledge that it works as a simulation. I'll be carrying-on with LT Spice.
Es muy bueno en la creacion de pcb

Can't copy contributed parts into the proper folder.
It seems taht the folder is owned by root, and I (the only user of my PC) cannot access it!
What a stupid restricion has been made during installation...
summary: Can't copy contributed parts into the proper folder

description: Really helpful to write down your electronics projects! Use to write down your breadboard assemly, your code, and even your pcb design, either you wish to build it yourself or want to print it!

Breadboard feature fairly good
Schematic wiring clunky 
Haven't tried PCB
Adequate Hmmm!!!
Es ist sehr toll, dass es weiter entwickelt wird. Vielen Dank an die Leute die das Programm erstellt haben.
summary: sehr tolles Programm für diverse Schaltungen

description: sehr einfach zu benuzen aber für mehr fortschritliche sachen sind andere programme besser geignet
Es bastante buena, le faltan cosas para ser perfecta pero con lo que tiene funciona y funciona bien, me agrada bastante.
Es una buena alternativa a otros software parecidos, tiene buen diseño, fácil de usar aveces falla, pero lo que no me gusta es que es algo difícil a la hora de diseñar las PCB.
Entorno muy sencillo e intuitivo para realizar pequeños diseños, sin necesidad de aprendizaje previo.
Bueno, recién lo instalo. Vamos a probar como se comporta al usar en mis diseños
summary: Vamos a ver como se sigue comportando

description: No carga los componentes
Para mis proyectos de la universidad me sirvió mucho.
estoy instalandolo a ver como va xddd ta bien
easy to use and very complete
Excelente para graficar circuitos de Electronica relacionados a Arduino
j ai eu quelques difficultés a l installer les "cores parts" mais a par cela ca roule
Peut-être que cette application fonctionne sous Windows 10 mais sûrement pas sous Linux 18.

Après installation, vous aurez systématiquement ces messages:

"Désolé, nous avons un problème dans la mise à jour des propriétés.
Fritzing va continuer à fonctionner, mais vous n'aurez pas la possibilité de changer les propriétés des composants."

"Impossible de lire le fichier /home/VotreUserName/bins/core.fzb :
No such file or directory."

"Fritzing ne parvient pas à charger le magasin de composants"



Ce qu'il faut faire :
-Télécharger le fichier fritzing parts-develop.zip dans:
https://github.com/fritzing/fritzing-parts

-dézipper et copier le contenu du répertoire : bins dans
/home/VotreUserName/bins
(oui, c'est pas beau, mais ça marche comme ça!)

-éventuellement, si ça continue a mettre des messages d'erreurs, supprimer le fichier:
/home/VotreUserName/parts.db
et relancer Fritzing.


En espérant que ça marche aussi pour vous... ou que l'équipe de fritzing propose un meilleur installer !
summary: L'installation de base ne fonctionne pas ! (procédure à suivre)

description: Je n'ai eu aucune difficulté à l'installer. Elle tourne très bien, mais elle n'ai plus maintenue sur linux. Donc vous n'aurez pas les nouvelles maj, à moins que vous la téléchargiez directement sur le site officiel ou elle est payante.
App nulle. Ne fonctionne pas sous ubuntu malgré installation par les ports. Compilation des sources depuis Github, KO, En plus il faudrait payer 8€ pour l'utiliser ? Je vais me former à EasyEDA.
après avoir installé le paquet principal via l'installateur de paquet, il faut installer via le terminal le paquet sudo apt install fritzing-parts
ne marche pas ne marche pas ne marche pas ne marche pas
summary: ne marche pas ne marhe pas ne marche pas

description:
如果通过软件商店安装可能会和我一样没有安装原件库，
手动安装：
sudo apt install fritzing-parts
